name: MTKMesh
desc: A container for the vertex data of a Model I/O mesh, suitable for use in a Metal app.

items.name: submeshes
items.desc: An array of submeshes containing index buffers referencing the mesh vertices.

items.name: vertexBuffers
items.desc: An array of buffers in which mesh vertex data resides.

items.name: vertexCount
items.desc: The number of vertices in the vertex buffers.

items.name: vertexDescriptor
items.desc: A Model I/O vertex descriptor specifying the data layout in the vertex buffers.
